resources.string:
Cosplay 
Playing Computer/Console Games 
Watching Movies and Series 
Listening to Music

I have gained experience with dealing with customers, admin-related tasks and staff training in my various roles in the past. I have many different certificates as I always strive to learn new things which will help me progress in my career. My most recent achievement is completing my BSc in Computer Systems which I decided to study as I really enjoyed working with the xPlan system as well working with the development team at iRess to troubleshoot and improve the system. 

I am good listener, trustworthy, reliable, dedicated, punctual, patient, work well in a team and am willing to learn new things. I am also a quick learner and I always strive to give everything I have to the tasks at hand. 

In my spare time I enjoying going online and going through tutorials or doing free online courses in order to expand my programming knowledge and to gain as much experience as I can to build on my skills. 

My goal in life is to become a great Software Developer working for a great development company and learning from other great developers to continually improve my skills. 

You can look at my personal projects on my GitHub account and my about.me page on the links below
Look at my on LinkedIn Page
